Microsoft Power BI

Brief:

Microsoft Power BI is a robust business intelligence platform that facilitates informed decision-making through its comprehensive data analytics and visualization tools. As a versatile suite, it encompasses Power BI Desktop, the Power BI web service, and the Power BI Mobile application, ensuring consistent access and data management across devices.
